text:
Hi,

I just installed Apache 4.0.40 (apache_2.0.40-win32-x86-no_ssl.msi)
and found a few errors:

 1) EULA doesn't show up.
 2) Registry entries for Apache were made for 4.0.39 instead of 4.0.40.

Rgds,

John
creator: mc@goinoff.com
psychosos@gmx.at
text:
also look at bug 11635 which is about the license agreement.

(i guess your "4.0.40" is a 
typo..?:)
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 11635 ***
creator: jwoolley@apache.org
mc@goinoff.com
text:
Hi,

Sorry about the typo..I did mean 2.0.40..
11635 doesn't cover the incorrect registry settings
under HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\software\apache group\.....
It still registers under 2.0.39 instead of 2.0.40.

John
